name: Mana Restoration Potion
description: A potion that restores a portion of the user's mana.
looks: The potion is a small vial filled with a shimmering blue liquid.

name: Speed Boots
description: A pair of boots that increase the wearer's movement speed.
looks: These boots are made of fine leather and have sleek silver buckles.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that contains the incantation for casting a fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment and sealed with a red wax seal.

special_effects.burning: Targets hit by the fireball will continue to burn and take additional fire damage over time.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A mystical sword that glows with arcane energy.
looks: The sword has a silver blade with glowing blue runes engraved on it. The hilt is made of polished obsidian.

special_weapon_skills.Two-Handed Sword Mastery: Increases damage with two-handed swords by 10%.

special_effects.Electric Surge: Has a 10% chance to shock the target and deal additional lightning damage.

name: Water Walking Boots
description: Boots that allow the wearer to walk on water.
looks: The boots are made of a lightweight, transparent material that gives the illusion of walking on water.

special_effects.water_walking: Allows the wearer to walk on water surfaces.

name: Staff of Fire
description: A powerful staff imbued with the element of fire.
looks: The staff is made of polished oak wood, with intricate carvings of flames along the length.

special_weapon_skils.Fireball: Allows the user to cast powerful fireballs at their enemies.

special_effects.Burning: Attacks with the staff have a chance to set enemies on fire, dealing additional damage over time.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that contains the knowledge to cast a fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of parchment and sealed with a wax seal.

special_effects.burning: Engulfs the target in flames, causing additional damage over time.
